page.title: 06The Women's Institute Today.
page.content: The{W.I.}was started to encourage country{women}to get together and develop{rural skills}but now it has changed its image.{Denman College}runs courses ranging from{art appreciation to{car maintenance}and members' hobbies include{skittles}and {hang_gliding.}The{W.I market}sells high_quality produce of all kinds . W.I.s have recently been started in {towns.}Though{non-sectarian}and {non-political}they have a considerable influence on{public affairs}as they are the largest women's organisation and they{campaign}vigorously on such subjects as the{closure of village {schools,loss of buses in rural areas, etc.They have also undertaken various {surveys }such as listing old farm buildings,wild life in churchyards, and the{Domesday Project.
